Articles.Content:
My first undersea facility "Zissou Base";

Only problem is once a sub docks with the base my viewpoint is suck looking at it from above and I can't rotate my view... even if i undock the view is stuck looking down from above... any thoughts?
This is an interesting idea but I doubt many people will have these. But Cool!

wow that's pretty cool.

pardon my ignorance but how to go underwater?
Actually, that mod is not being developed anymore, thinking of maybe picking up the gauntlet and continuing it...

Only problem is once a sub docks with the base my viewpoint is suck looking at it from above and I can't rotate my view... even if i undock the view is stuck looking down from above... any thoughts?

This is located in the overview of that mod and may fix this issue: "- When switching between underwater vessels the special underwater camera may not activate. The camera will appear stuck above. Right click a vesselÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s part and choose Ã¢â‚¬Å“Toggle Underwater CameraÃ¢â‚¬Â to fix this."

Also, it looks like someone has already taken over for Hooligan Labs in keeping his mods up to date: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53961-0-22-Hooligan-Labs-%28now-under-new-managment%29-Featuring-Airships-Subs-and-more

PS: That's really frikin cool!

1.0.5. Added Stock Underwater Physics.

I humbly request reopening of this Thread.

Looks like I get to kick it off, something small I put together, can I say the water on Kerbin is crystal clear, never had that sort of view distance anywhere else I have dived.

- - - Updated - - -

By the way, I am thinking of some things

Seaquest 2032, DSV

Voyage to the bottom of the sea

Woa! I love that series!

Seaquest was amazing!
I like this idea and plan to build an underwater base one day!
Now we just need someone to build an underwater rocket construction bay with an elevating launch pad that raises to the surface before deploying the rocket.
Got my first seabase done- it sits off the coast of the old airstrip island.

I started a Project called Deepcore, this is the name of my Deep Sea Base. The video shows how I started the Project, I will continue to post as I make progress. I'm still not the greatest on these videos but they are getting a little better every time I make one.....so I think!

[video=youtube;CNkwOsXcxsk]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CNkwOsXcxsk&feature=youtu.be[/video]

Project Deepcore Part 2 - Submarine Deepdiver One

Rescue Jebediah at 215 Meters Deep

[video=youtube;fDU7Vr7HI3I]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fDU7Vr7HI3I&feature=youtu.be[/video]

[imgur]eciJy[/imgur]

I would not have ever known how much fun and challenging this was if I haven't tried this Subsea Base idea! Edited November 26, 2015 by castille7
